attributes.action: caution speeding drivers for first offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
burglars muggers and druggies are all cautioned for their first offence.
why not the same for drivers that are caught speeding by the speed cameras for the first time.providing they are not involved in an accident.this will prove then the cameras are not just money making machines.
if they are caught a second time then they should be fined accordingly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
